svglite
  • Home
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Run plotting code and return svg as string

This is useful primarily for testing but can be used as an alternative to svgstring().

stringSVG(code, ...)

Arguments

code
Plotting code to execute.
...
Other arguments passed on to svglite.

Examples

stringSVG(plot(1:10))
Saving 7" x 7" image
